short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submit KanTime time cards quickly and easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps reduce your home healthcare administrative burden by auto-filling default values into KanTime eCharts.

Features:
1. Adds a button to KanTime schedule pages to "Run TimeCarder". This opens all unsubmitted, past eCharts displayed on the schedule.

2. eChart check-in and check-out times are populated with scheduled times.

3. The following eChart checkboxes are checked:
Incident Report: "No" 
Patient Identification: "Full Name" and "DOB"
Vitals: "NA" (Only if no "Monitoring" Service Plan Tasks are present)
Service Plan Tasks: "Performed" (All)
Clinician Signature: Acknowledgement

4. Client Sign Page:
Signed By: "Other" checkbox selected
Signed By Name: Filled from Options page
Signature Confirmation checkbox selected

5. An options page for entering signature name, accessed by right clicking the extension icon.

Please send your feedback or suggestions to timecarder@gmail.com.

As always, you bear all responsibility for the accuracy of your submitted time cards.
